pageContext.claim: “We are strengthening standards to prevent vulnerable children from being exposed to lead and copper in drinking water, including in our schools. They were exposed to lead and copper in drinking water.”
pageContext.analysis: A fact check by NBC News reported “the rule has been revised previously and the major overhaul Trump is referring to has been in the works at the EPA for more than a decade.” Moreover, experts have not seen the revamped rule and so consequently, cannot say if it would actually improve water safety.
